title: AI based Video editing tool
description: An AI-powered video editing tool that processes user prompts to automatically edit videos according to specified instructions. It streamlines the editing workflow by converting text commands into precise video adjustments.

title: AI agent for physiotherapy assistance and appointment booking
description: A specialized AI agent designed to assist with physiotherapy-related queries and facilitate appointment bookings. It provides personalized guidance and support for patients seeking physiotherapy services.

title: Django SQL Querying API
description: A backend application built with Python and Django that provides a RESTful API for querying a database based on user-submitted prompts. It utilizes Django REST framework for API development, includes OpenAPI schema definitions for endpoints, and is containerized with Docker. To be deployed on Coolify

title: OpenCV Photo Editor
description: A versatile image editing tool built using OpenCV, a powerful open-source computer vision and image processing library. This project empowers users to manipulate, enhance, and color grade their images with precision and ease.
